articles.title: US Urges Americans In Russia To Leave "Immediately" - NDTV
articles.description: US State Department Secretary Antony Blinken on Thursday requested the Americans living in Russia to leave the country "immediately", after the reporter was arrested in Moscow.
articles.content:
Antony Blinken requested the Americans living in Russia to leave the country. (File)

articles.title: Ajay Banga poised to become World Bank chief unopposed - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Indian-American business leader Ajay Banga is poised to become the next President of the World Bank after the nomination period closed and no country proposed an alternate candidate for the prestigious post. In February, President Joe Biden announced that the…

articles.title: 'The Silent Disease': Thousands may have kidney disease, but may not know it - KMBC 9
